mapper.select: select seq, aply_tot_amt, aply_prgrs, aply_dt, aply_name, jikbun_se, church_adtr, church_addr, church_dtl_addr, schdl_se, phone, email, checkbox, full_address, detail_address, join_his_se, rgtr_nm, rgtr_dt, updt_nm, updt_dt, kakao_email, pyr_nm, checkbox_use_room, bank_nm, kakao_id, memo from T_CM_APLY_CAMP
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_CM_CONECT_LOG ( conect_url, conect_dt, menu_nm, os_knd, os_nm, browser_nm, ip_adres, ref_url, prmanent_cookie, tmpr_cookie ) VALUES ( #{conectUrl}, #{conectDt}, #{menuNm}, #{osKnd}, #{osNm}, #{browserNm}, #{ipAdres}, #{refUrl}, #{prmanentCookie}, #{tmprCookie} )
